Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 32.
Subjects: mistress, false; lover’s lament; women, faithlessness of
_description: Beware of a false mistress — four cross-rhymed quatrains

BodRawC813.First Lines: a newe songe anewevnto yow louers blynde…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…take hede I saye ye doo nott Soobe warre ye louers of Suche
                    treason
